task.title: Remove The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can remove your typewriter platen by activating the platen detent arm and platen release lever.

step.cmd: Raise the paper support and paper bail so that they are not resting on the platen.
Pull the platen detent arm outwards.
Lift the platen roller up and to the right until the platen is fully removed from the typewriter.
